          The path of the document on the disk.

          boolean saved
          Indicates whether document is saved.

        • savedOnDisk

          boolean savedOnDisk
          Indicates if the document was already flushed to the disc, independent of the saved flag.

        • newDocument

          boolean newDocument
          Indicates true when this is a just created blank document.

          javax.swing.JTextArea content

          javax.swing.JButton findNext
          The button used to order a Finder.FIND_NEXT direction to the FindDialog.find(byte) method.

        • finder

          Finder finder
          The object used to make searches in a TextDocument and highlight (select) results on a TextArea.

        • findPrevious

          javax.swing.JButton findPrevious
          The button used to order a Finder.FIND_PREVIOUS direction to the FindDialog.find(byte) method.

        • wholeWord

          javax.swing.JCheckBox wholeWord
          Check box used to inform the finder whether searching perfect whole matches of the search.

        • matchCase

          javax.swing.JCheckBox matchCase
          Check box used to inform the finder whether consider matching the case of the search on find process.
